name: Retro Ice Smoothie Mix: Old Style Pop Art Vintage Sweet Candy Maker
name_original: Retro Ice Smoothie Mix: Old Style Pop Art Vintage Sweet Candy Maker
description:
In Retro Ice Smoothie Mix: Snow Cone, gather your recipes and make a cool, slushy dessert to drink!

Grind up your ice to a small size and put it in the right size cup, then choose what flavor you like most!

Product Features:
- Snow cone themed dessert salon game.
- Easy to use controls to choose items and decorate.
- Yummy slush flavors to create unique recipes!
- Tons of ways to make your favorite frozen treat!
- Learn how to make cool drinks perfect for summer!
- Try different flavors and mix and match.
- Decorate your snow cone to top it off!
